title.rendered: How to use technology during the lockdown?

content.rendered:
As we all know that all the globe is in Lockdown due to novel coronavirus, the pandemic. Most of the public sector and private services are in Lockdown and if you think information technology is free from it then You are wrong……

Most of the top companies in the IT (Information Technology) sector including HawksCode, Infosys, Wipro, TCS and many more were gone under lockdown for the last few months and still don’t know the future.

 “THE IT SECTOR IS THE BIGGEST ECONOMIC BONE OF ANY COUNTRY”

The economy is the most dangerous issue in the world during covid_19 and for cop-up with this most of the IT, firms decided to apply for work from home on their employees. 

 But now the question is what type of technology we use amid covid_19. 

Technology plays an important role in the world and now in the time of lockdown, its role is more important. We have discussed some points on how to use technology during lockdown especially in the Information Technology sector. 

  1. Use Skype – Skype is one of the best ways to be in touch with your clients and employees during the lockdown, one can communicate with others and share all the information and details with one another.
  2. Zoom – Zoom is another platform where one can conduct video conference or so-called webinar for meetings and conferences. 
  3. Google Drive – Google drive is one of the best ways to share your data with others, it is the free source provided by Google. 
  4. Artificial Intelligence (AI) – This New Technology is the best way to deal with work without human efforts. Many devices nowadays are accessible to most of our efforts.. Few examples like Alexa, Google voice, eco, etc.. 
  5. Cloud Computing – It’s the old trend now to save all the data in files and brochures, now most of the data have been stored in cloud only. It is the best way to store data and one can access the data from anywhere in the world.
  6. Broadcast – broadcast is the fastest way to share the details and data with the employees, so in mid of lockdown, the broadcast will play an important role. 

Coronavirus is the most dangerous pandemic in the world now., it is spread already across the globe and economy is affected by it. So the information technology sector plays an important role.
